snippet.title: Lifeline (iPhone/Apple Watch/iPad/Android) Launch Trailer - Official Mobile Game (2015)
snippet.description:
Subscribe NOW to MOBILE GAME TRAILERS: http://bit.ly/1yKujPr
Lifeline (iPhone/Apple Watch/iPad/Android) Launch Trailer is an official Mobile Game (2015). Play Lifeline now! http://bigfi.sh/Lifeline

Acclaimed writer Dave Justus (Fables: The Wolf Among Us) weaves a gripping tale through the aftermath of a crash landing on an alien moon. Playing out in real time, you will stay in communication with Taylor through notifications on your iPhone, iPad, or Apple Watch, making life or death decisions and facing the consequences together. Will your choices keep Taylor alive until rescue arrives?

Thanks for all your support, rating this video and leave a comment is always appreciated! Please respect each other in the comments!
